title: Nintendo Direct E3 2021 Kinda Funny Live Reactions
description:
Tim, Greg, Blessing, Andy, and Janet react to Zelda, Mario Party, Wario Ware, Fatal Frame, Metroid Dread, and more!

Follow Janet Garcia here https://twitter.com/Gameonysus

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr 
Andy - http://www.twitter.com/TheAndyCortez 
Mike - http://www.twitter.com/SnowBikeMike
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy 
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: what's up and welcome back to another kind of funny live e3 2021 reaction as always i'm tim gettys joined by the nitro rifle andy cortez good morning gamers the new face of video games blessing at aoya junior what's up tim and joining us for this uh because i personally reached out to her because i wanted to do this with her janet garcia what's good glad to be here greg miller will be joining us in a second after he gets off the e3 stage but this is it everybody nintendo direct e3 2021 i am so excited this is always all wrong the show that i am most excited for every year besides playstation playstation they ain't here so it's all on the big n right now bless give me your hype levels one to ten i'm at a nine i'm out of nine i think there's a lot of potential for really exciting things to show up here i want nintendo to tell me what the rest of this year looks like i want them to give me hype about the rest of this year so if they do that then it's a success and there's potential we
